title: Growth Internship

programDetails.about: This 6-month program is designed to immerse you in the world of B2B SaaS. You will receive extensive training and mentorship, rotating through different functions to develop a broad skill set. We're looking for individuals who are quick learners, excellent communicators, and critical thinkers.

responsibilities.brandSolutions: Assist the sales team with market research, lead generation, and creating compelling presentations for potential clients.
responsibilities.customerSuccess: Support the customer success team by helping to onboard new clients, analyze customer data, and contribute to client engagement strategies.
responsibilities.projects: Work on a capstone project that will contribute directly to the team's goals.

requirements: A recent graduate or current student pursuing a bachelor's degree in any field
Exceptional communication skills - both written and verbal
Strong comprehension skills - ability to quickly understand complex information and concepts
Proven critical thinking skills - ability to analyze problems, evaluate options, and propose effective solutions
A positive attitude, a strong work ethic, and a desire to learn
benefits: Learn and Grow: You'll be mentored by industry experts and work on real-world challenges
Career Path: High-performing interns will be considered for a full-time position upon completion of the program
Great Culture: Join a collaborative and supportive team that values innovation and new ideas

companyInfo.about: Shopalyst offers a Discovery Commerce platform for digital marketers. Combining data, AI and deep integrations with digital media and e-commerce platforms, Shopalyst connects people with products they love. More than 500 marquee brands leverage our SaaS platform for data driven marketing and sales in 30 countries across Asia, Europe and Americas.

additionalNotes: At Shopalyst, we are creating a global workplace that enables everyone to find their true potential, purpose, and passion irrespective of their background, gender, race, sexual orientation, religion and ethnicity. We are committed to providing equal opportunity for all and believe that diversity in the workplace creates a more vibrant, richer work environment that advances the goals of our employees, communities and the business.

title: Sales Internship
aboutCompany: We’re a profitable, seed-funded B2B Commerce startup, revolutionising how businesses interact and transact. Despite our small size, we’re making big waves in the industry. Currently, we’re a tight-knit team, and we’re looking for a passionate individual to join us on this exciting journey.
whyJoinUs: Be part of a high-growth, fast-paced environment where you can make a real impact
Work directly with the Founders and Sales Head
Be part of a profitable startup journey which is building state-of-the-art tech in procurement industry
Shape the future of AI-driven commerce and automate complex workflows
responsibilities: Develop and implement effective sales strategies specific to the Metal industry
Define and manage sales territories to maximize market coverage
Identify and target key clients and prospects within the sector
Identify and pursue new business opportunities within the B2B segment by finding relevant leads
Conduct face-to-face client meetings to understand their needs and provide customized solutions
Build and nurture strong client relationships through regular interactions
Track and analyze sales performance metrics
Implement corrective actions to ensure sales targets are met
skillsNeeded: B2B sales within the iron and steel industry
Ability to develop and implement successful sales strategies
